column3: I'm curious, have you been able to reproduce the issue locally? I've ran the test 1,000+ times and couldn't.

It seems to me that it would make more sense to separate p2p-layer behaviors that we want to test from consensus-layer behaviors that we want to test -- otherwise there's a risk that changes to one might break our tests for another.\n\nI was surprised, when reviewing this just now, that the behavior of `send_blocks_and_test` when `request_block=False` is to not send the block at all, rather than
